title: The sharp constant in the Hardy-Sobolev-Maz’ya inequality in the three dimensional upper half-space
abstract: It is shown that the sharp constant in the Hardy-Sobolev-Maz’ya inequality on the upper half space H^3 ⊂ R^3 is given by the Sobolev constant. This is achieved by a duality argument relating the problem to a Hardy-Littlewood-Sobolev type inequality whose sharp constant is determined as well.
